ingredients.ingredient: 1 pound skinless, boneless chicken breast halves

cookingTips: Cook on low for 4-6 hours for tender, juicy chicken; high heat dries it out
Shred chicken with forks while still warm for maximum tenderness
Drain excess liquid if desired, or reserve for sauce and versatile meal prep
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Slow cooking is foolproof for lean chicken breast. Explain why this method keeps skinless chicken moist and how flexible toppings make it diet-friendly.
